/* Polihali Dam Test */

/*
This shows all mountains (peaks) in the Dolomites.
You may want to use the "zoom onto data" button. =>
*/

[out:json];

// search the area of the Dolmites
/*area
  poly:"-29.254653206403407 28.755340576171875 -29.27442054681336 28.849411010742188 -29.294782899651672 28.868637084960938 -29.374396619361622 28.862457275390625 -29.379183431737633 29.139862060546875 -29.17374704477497 29.13848876953125 -29.14676413396271 28.758087158203125";
out body;*/

// get all peaks in the area
way
  [waterway=river]
  (poly:"-29.254653206403407 28.755340576171875 -29.27442054681336 28.849411010742188 -29.294782899651672 28.868637084960938 -29.374396619361622 28.862457275390625 -29.379183431737633 29.139862060546875 -29.17374704477497 29.13848876953125 -29.14676413396271 28.758087158203125");
out body;
way
  [waterway=stream]
  (poly:"-29.254653206403407 28.755340576171875 -29.27442054681336 28.849411010742188 -29.294782899651672 28.868637084960938 -29.374396619361622 28.862457275390625 -29.379183431737633 29.139862060546875 -29.17374704477497 29.13848876953125 -29.14676413396271 28.758087158203125");
out body;


// additionally, show the outline of the area
/*relation
  ["name"="Mokhotlong District"]
  ["boundary"="administrative"]
  ["admin_level"="5"];*/
/*relation[waterway=river](-29.46889445277981,28.74641418457031,-29.045965338037213,29.279251098632812)->.river;*/
/*way[waterway=river](-29.46889445277981,28.74641418457031,-29.045965338037213,29.279251098632812);*/
/*way[waterway=stream](-29.46889445277981,28.74641418457031,-29.045965338037213,29.279251098632812);*/
/*out body;*/
>;
out skel qt;


/*
This shows the cycleway and cycleroute network.
(
  // get cycle route relatoins
  relation[route=bicycle](-29.46889445277981,28.74641418457031,-29.045965338037213,29.279251098632812)->.cr;
  // get cycleways
  way[highway=cycleway](-29.46889445277981,28.74641418457031,-29.045965338037213,29.279251098632812);
  way[highway=path][bicycle=designated](-29.46889445277981,28.74641418457031,-29.045965338037213,29.279251098632812);
);
*/

(
  relation(poly:"-29.254653206403407 28.755340576171875 -29.27442054681336 28.849411010742188 -29.294782899651672 28.868637084960938 -29.374396619361622 28.862457275390625 -29.379183431737633 29.139862060546875 -29.17374704477497 29.13848876953125 -29.14676413396271 28.758087158203125");
  <;
);
out meta;*/
